item.title: Virtual Device Demo
item.description:
SpaceBunny is a managed cloud platform that makes it easy for your connected devices to easily and securely interact with applications or even with each other.
With SpaceBunny your applications can keep track of and communicate with all your devices even when they aren’t connected.
This demo shows how
item.dc:creator: Tommaso Berlose
item.content:encoded:
SpaceBunny is a managed cloud platform that makes it easy for your connected devices to easily and securely interact with applications or even with each other.
With SpaceBunny your applications can keep track of and communicate with all your devices even when they aren’t connected.
This demo shows how to connect your Android phone to SpaceBunny.

  • VIRTUAL DEVICE APP
  • VIRTUAL DEVICE WEB SITE
  • GITHUB PROJECT

item.title: Focus Notify
item.description:
Enter your notes between notifications and keep everything under control!
Use Focus Notify to add notes directly between notifications.
Enter comments, links and photos to remind you all that you need having everything under control.

Notifications rapid, non-invasive with all actions at a tap.

  • GITHUB PROJECT
  • GOOGLE PLAY STORE
item.dc:creator: Tommaso Berlose

item.title: Screen Off
item.description:
Simple and minimalistic app in material design that turn off screen by shortcuts, third party applications and notification.
Simple, no additional features, and elegant: do everything you need without tricks.

  • GITHUB PROJECT
  • GOOGLE PLAY STORE
item.dc:creator: Tommaso Berlose
item.content:encoded:

  • GOOGLE PLAY STORE

item.title: Wake Up
item.description:
Wake up your device when you get a notification.
Your smartphone has a lockscreen with the notification list but does not have the double tap to wake or a cool assistant?
Your smartphone does not have the LED pulsating and your display does not turn on the arrival of a
item.dc:creator: Tommaso Berlose
item.content:encoded:
Wake up your device when you get a notification.
Your smartphone has a lockscreen with the notification list but does not have the double tap to wake or a cool assistant?
Your smartphone does not have the LED pulsating and your display does not turn on the arrival of a notification?
Or your smartphone has all this and you still want to give us a chance ...

Wake Up is a simple and usefull app that turn on the screen when you receive a notification.
It allows to decide whether to do it working even when the silent mode is active or when the device is in your pocket.

  • GITHUB PROJECT
  • GOOGLE PLAY STORE

item.title: Wallet
item.description:
Track your money!
Use Wallet to remember those who lend money or who do you pay.
Do not waste time thinking about your business, let there be Wallet to work for you.

  • GITHUB PROJECT
  • GOOGLE PLAY STORE

item.title: Night Mode
item.description:
Activate night mode and turn off everything you do not need with a single tap.
Are you ready to sleep, you're about to start an important meeting or just do not want to be disturbed?
Turn off everything you do not need with a single tap.

  • GITHUB PROJECT
  • GOOGLE PLAY
